fixes.name: Delta Down T USD 7Y
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR market = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MARKET_NAME]
VAR term = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR ddtusd = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD]
VAR fixVal = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    market,
    "sUSDMid",
        IF(term = "6 Yr" || term = "6 Yr Swap", 1/2*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "8 Yr" || term = "8 Yr Swap", 2/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "9 Yr" || term = "9 Yr Swap", 1/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    "USDsUSD1mMid",
        IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "6 Yr" || term = "6 Yr Swap", 1/2*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "8 Yr" || term = "8 Yr Swap", 2/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "9 Yr" || term = "9 Yr Swap", 1/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    "USDsUSD6mMid",
        IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    "USDsUSD12mMid",
        IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    "USDsUSD1dMid",
        IF(term = "6 Yr" || term = "6 Yr Swap", 1/2*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "8 Yr" || term = "8 Yr Swap", 2/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "9 Yr" || term = "9 Yr Swap", 1/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    "USDsUSDs1dMid",
        IF(term = "6 Yr" || term = "6 Yr Swap", 1/2*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "8 Yr" || term = "8 Yr Swap", 2/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0)
        + IF(term = "9 Yr" || term = "9 Yr Swap", 1/3*(ddtusd + fixVal), 0),

    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau CASE on [MARKET_NAME] as a DAX SWITCH over the market value. Row-level conditions on [TERM_LABEL] are implemented with IF(..., value, 0) and numeric multipliers preserved (1/2, 2/3, 1/3). All field references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] and intermediate variables (market, term, ddtusd, fixVal) are used for readability. This is a row-level computation so implemented as a calculated column.
